про Counter-Strike: Source бессмысленно рассказывать так как все о нем уже знают-это соревновательный шутер где соревнуются контр-террористы и террористы вот все что можно рассказать о Counter-Strike: Source
I met my wife on this game,

Having no Prior experience to the Counter-Strike series I went in not knowing fully what to expect.

What I found was a masterpiece of a game. The guns feel just right, and by playing conservitavely is rewarded. Ramboing will get you killed fast and waste your cash.

Play it slowly, play it tactically. Victory will be yours, and make sure to communicate with your team, it will make it all the easier to win!
Difficile agli inizi, ma può dare grandi soddisfazioni!
If you do not have this game already, buy it now!

You really don't need my recommendation for this game, because Counter Strike is an FPS classic. Counter Strike: Source is basically a remake of the classic CS, with updated graphics and such but well worth the money for the serious FPS gamer.

What can I say about the game? It's THE defining skill-based FPS, amazingly moddable and has a wonderful history of excellent and welcoming communities. 

At the time of writing, I've been playing this game for 1/3 of my entire life, and I don't regret a second of it.
El origen de todos los shooters merece ser recordado :)
Counter-Strike: Source is a great competative First-Person Shooter, the sequel to the original Counter-Strike. This game is addicting and fun.

Counter Strike: Source, when I first bought it I thought it would have more gun variety but instead I'm met with some pathetic guns that sound so unrealistic and look like plastic, I know this was made in 2010 but come on, we had the technology to import guns from real life or at least get some good model designers to make it.

Another problem I had with this worthless game is that there is no Iron-Sights, this was one of the biggest things I expect from my first person shooter games but again I was met with disapointment that I am unable to make my 720 quick-scope. 

I was also horribly brutalized by the enemy because I couldn't hide behind a rock and wait for some strawberry jelly to slide off my screen as I got shot, my health didn't regenerate, I mean, what the hell is with that. I expect from modern shooters for my health to regenerate and clearly the developers who blatently are trying to make a bad Call Of Duty rip off couldn't even be bothered to do this.
EL GERMEN DE LOS CAMPEROS DEL SIGLO XXI, LA BASE DE NUESTRA SOSIEDÁH, UN CLÁSICO
Fantastic game, nothing quite like a classic game of cs to top up the win meter for the day
